channel.title: [Flash] Messenger?
channel.description:
Would it be possible to create a Flash program that would be capable of messaging another Flash program? I know that Flash has TCP capabilities but can it be done? I was thinking that Flash would be able to send a string of text to a server (Maybe a Java server? I was reading up on it and one website recommended Java) and that server would send that string to another Flash client (based on IP addresses or client numbers) and the client would parse (I don't know the correct usage of parse, but it sounds appropriate) the data and display it on the second client as well as the 1st one. The client would have to have:
[ul][li]A log in system (easy, just load variables from a MySQL database)[/li] [li]TCP connection capabilities[/li][/ul]
And the server would have to be able to receive and send strings or packets of data from and to different clients and have a login verification system.
So, does anyone think it's possible?
